Kely means small in Malagasy, and Orange for the color.

Sure, a 4L will break down now and then, but fixing it is part of the adventure.
Turns out we might have overestimated our desire for adventure.

Then the gas pedal fell off.

Oh, we got the local experience, all right.
Soon I was just like any other Malagasy driver, running out of gas going up a hill and then rolling backwards down the hill into a gas station.

I'm not a tourist here.
I'm part of this community.
